location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘File C 7/8 Serving of Writs on Americans’

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in chronological order from the front to the rear of the file.

Foliation: The foliation sequence commences at the front cover with 1 and terminates at the inside back cover with 5; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio. A previous foliation sequence, which is also circled, has been has been superseded and therefore crossed out.

mods.abstract: The file contains a request sent to the Political Agency by Clifton P English, United States Consul at Basra, asking the Political Agent to serve a writ against Thomas Wallace, an employee of the Kuwait Oil Company. It also contains the Agent's (Herbert George Jakins) reply.
